data.title: Byron (name)
data.text:
1 language

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Byron ( )[1][2] is an English toponymic surname that is derived from Byram, North Yorkshire.[3] Its use as a given name derives from the surname.

Surname

[edit]

Beverly Byron (born 1932), U.S. Congresswoman, widow of Goodloe Byron

David Byron (1947–1985), 20th-century British musician, former singer of Uriah Heep

Delma Byron (1913–2006), American actress
